title: Update vs to Version 17.4.0 Preview 2.0 from PREVIEW 1 cause errors in publish worker service
body:
I reported on this bug:
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues?q=is%3Aissue+author%3A%40me+is%3Aclosed
@rainersigwald & @Forgind Can I go one version back, to vs version 17.4 preview 1
After I build it in vs 17.4 preview 2 ?
Thanks in advance.

nodes.body: Please stop filing duplicate issues when you feel you haven't gotten a response quickly enough.
